Package controller

Class MainScreenController

java.lang.Object
controller.MainScreenController
public class MainScreenController extends Object
This controller class provides logic for the Main Screen Form.

  • Constructor Details

    • MainScreenController

      public MainScreenController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize() throws SQLException
      This method initializes the appointments and customers' table views and populates the columns with the appropriate values. The included lambda expression creates an alert if there's an upcoming appointment within 15 minutes of the user's current time.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • appointmentViewToggle

      public void appointmentViewToggle(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method handles the all, weekly, and monthly appointments radio buttons. The data in the appointments table view will change according to which button the user clicks on.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - all, weekly, or monthly radio button clicked.

    • mainViewsAddCustomerButtonClicked

      public void mainViewsAddCustomerButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException, SQLException
      This method handles the add customer button. This method switches screens to the Customer FXML form for the user to add a customer.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - --> add customer button clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException
      SQLException

    • mainViewsUpdateCustomerButtonClicked

      public void mainViewsUpdateCustomerButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      This method handles the update customer button. This method retrieves the chosen customer from the Customer Table and fills the Customer FXML form to be edited. If the user doesn't select any customer, then an error message will display prompting them to choose a customer to update.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - --> update customer button clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException
      SQLException

    • mainViewsDeleteCustomerButtonClicked

      public void mainViewsDeleteCustomerButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      This method handles the delete customer button. This method deletes the selected customer from the database, which will remove them from the Customer Table and all associated Appointments database and the Appointment Table View. If no customer is selected by the user, then an error message will display telling them they need to select a customer.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - -> delete customer button clicked.
      Throws:
      SQLException
      IOException

    • mainViewsAddAppointmentButtonClicked

      public void mainViewsAddAppointmentButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method handles the add appointment button. This method changes screens to the Appointment FXML form so the user can add an appointment.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - -> add appointment button clicked.
      Throws:
      Exception
      IOException

    • mainViewsUpdateAppointmentButtonClicked

      public void mainViewsUpdateAppointmentButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method handles the update appointment button. This method changes screens to the Appointment FXML form and fills the fields with the selected appointment's data to be edited. If no appointment was selected, then an error message will display telling the user they need to make a selection.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - update appointment button click
      Throws:
      Exception
      IOException

    • mainViewsDeleteAppointmentButtonClicked

      public void mainViewsDeleteAppointmentButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      This method handles delete appointment button. This method deletes the appointment data from the database and the Appointment Table View. If no appointment was selected, then an error message will display telling the user they have to select an appointment.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - delete appointment button clicked.
      Throws:
      SQLException
      IOException

    • mainViewsReportsButtonClicked

      public void mainViewsReportsButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method handles the reports button. This method switches screens to the Reports main screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - reports button clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • mainViewsExitButtonClicked

      public void mainViewsExitButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      The exit button lets the user exit the main screen and is redirected to the navigation screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - exit button clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException
